ValidationRule.description: If AML Status is KYC Approved & Completed then AML Parameters should be required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'KYC Completed'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'KYC Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved')), OR( IF( ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Individual'), OR( ISBLANK(Nationality__c ), ISBLANK(Country_Of_Birth__c ), ISBLANK(Country_Of_Residence__c ), ISBLANK(Screening_Shareholder__c ), ISBLANK(Employment_Type__c ), ISBLANK(Industry__c ), ISBLANK(Business_Location__c ), ISBLANK(Mode_of_Payment__c ), ISBLANK(Source_of_Fund_Wealth__c )), false),
IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Corporate'), ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Trust')), OR( ISBLANK(Customer_s_Country_of_Registration__c ), ISBLANK(Beneficial_Owner_Country_of_Citizenship__c ), ISBLANK(Industry__c ), ISBLANK(Year_of_Establishment__c ), ISBLANK(Financial_Information_Documents__c ), ISBLANK(Mode_of_Payment__c ), ISBLANK(Screening_Shareholder__c ), ISBLANK(Other_businesses_of_the_client__c )), false) ), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status is Approved OR KYC Completed OR KYC Approved. AML Type is "Individual" then "Individual AML Parameter" required. / AML Type is "Corporate" then "Corporate AML parameter" required and Screening Shareholder, Industry & Mode of Payment is also re
